input_text:
Job Title: Sr. Civil Nuclear Engineer

Location: Juno Beach, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job#: 2013935

Job Description:

Apex Systems is looking for an Sr. Civil Nuclear Engineer to work remotely with a major renewables energy company.

For immediate consideration please email your updated resume to [email protected]

Weekly Pay - Full Benefits

REMOTE contract position: Must be willing to relocate to Florida if converted after contract term

Contract position starting out at 1 year.

MUST be willing to travel to northern sites, Point Beach (Wisconsin) , Seabrook (New Hampshire), and Jupiter West (Florida) – travel about monthly – 25% travel

This job is responsible for preparing Design Change Packages in accordance with the Standard Design Change process.

Job Duties:

Performs modifications to operating powerplantsEngineering paperworkLicensing type reviewsUtilize standard design process to create packages to make modificationsParts/piece that need to be upgradeReviews the same design change packages, lots of outsourcing so they need to review those again

What is exciting about this position ? Company ?

 Massive company with ops for growth Potential to convert

 MUST NICE TO HAVE technologies 

Design Change Packages: “Design Engineers”Engineering Change packages per the Standard Design Process (SDP)

NICE TO HAVES

Experience with drafting, GT Strudel, welding, rigging, seismic qualification, pipe supports and pipe stress analysis5-8 years engineering experience

Preferred Education Experience: 

Bachelor’s - Engineering

Up to 3 years experience with Nuclear

EEO Employer

Apex Systems is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate or allow discrimination on the basis of race, color, religion, creed, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding, or related medical conditions), age, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, disability, status as a crime victim, protected veteran status, political affiliation, union membership, or any other characteristic protected by law. Apex will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. If you have visited our website in search of information on employment opportunities or to apply for a position, and you require an accommodation in using our website for a search or application, please contact our Employee Services Department at [email protected] or 844-463-6178 .

Apex Systems is a world-class IT services company that serves thousands of clients across the globe. When you join Apex, you become part of a team that values innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. We offer quality career resources, training, certifications, development opportunities, and a comprehensive benefits package. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in many awards, including ClearlyRated's Best of Staffing® in Talent Satisfaction in the United States and Great Place to Work® in the United Kingdom and Mexico.
